summary: REQ-6 (default site title on fresh/uninitialized state) appears implemented by setting the backend default `websiteContent.siteTitle` to "welcome to waxy". However, the diff introduces a separate Motoko module for migration (violating the constraint to keep Motoko logic in `backend/main.mo`) and also forces defaults for other content fields (hero/main/footer) beyond the requested site title change.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a separate Motoko migration module and wired it into the actor via `(with migration = Migration.run)`, adding Motoko logic outside the single main actor file.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint: "Keep all Motoko logic in the single main actor (backend/main.mo)." The diff adds `backend/migration.mo` and imports/uses it from `backend/main.mo`.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration logic overwrites the entire `websiteContent` (heroSection, mainSection, footerText) rather than only updating the default site title.
hallucinated_features.reason: Only the site title default update was requested (REQ-6). The migration sets hero/main/footer text as well, which is not requested and may violate the non-goal about not changing those texts unless explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend default `websiteContent` includes explicit hero/main/footer text values (not just the site title).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 only asks to update the default persisted site title; changing or re-specifying other user-facing copy was not requested and may conflict with the non-goal of not changing hero/main/footer text unless requested.
